parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the idler shaft lever can cause catastrophic engine damage, leading to engine seizure, and potentially resulting in serious harm to the operator or accidents.
symptoms: Loud metal clang in the engine
motorcycle comes to a sudden halt
broken pieces of the idler shaft lever in the lower end of the engine
dislodged balancer chain from the sprocket
metal debris attached to the magnetic oil plug.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the balancer tensioner spring can cause engine damage, potentially leading to engine seizure, and serious harm to the operator or accidents.
symptoms: Broken spring where it attaches to the engine case
failure of the balancer tensioner system

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the counterbalancer chain tensioner lever can cause catastrophic engine damage, leading to engine seizure, and potentially resulting in serious harm to the operator or accidents.
symptoms: broken piece got into the transmission main shaft bearing and destroyed the race/bearing-holder
bearings still in place but problem not apparent while operating the motorcycle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the balancer spring can cause engine damage, valve damage, or even engine seizure, leading to a potential loss of control, accidents, or fatalities.
symptoms: tail end of the spring missing

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Premature tire wear or failure can lead to a loss of control, accidents, and injuries, especially at high speeds. It can also cause inconvenience and financial losses due to frequent tire replacements.
